title.rendered: 21-Day Diet Challenge if You Weigh Over 200 lbs

content.rendered:
21-Day Diet Challenge if You Weigh Over 200 lbs

21-Day Diet Challenge if You Weigh Over 200 lbs

Learn more!

This 21-Day Diet Challenge if you weigh 200 lbs or more is designed to get you real results, FAST! 

 There are no weird shakes or gimmicks – just REAL FOOD.

Learn more!

Why Does This Program Work?

The faster the weight comes off, the more short-term and long-term success you are likely to have.

Learn more!

“Is that even healthy?”

The dangers of having extra fat on your body far outweigh the risks of losing weight quickly.

Learn more!

The Importance of a Detox

If you weigh more than 200 lbs, you are most likely insulin resistant and leptin resistant.

Detoxing from sugars and carbs helps to reset these hormones.

Learn more!

What Does It Actually Mean to Detox??

A dietary detox means you will abstain from certain unhealthy and inflammatory foods to allow your body to rid itself of toxins.

Learn more!

What Makes Up an Effective Detox??

A great detox plan is both simple and produces noticeable results.

This detox diet plan focuses on minimizing hormonal responses and maximizing nutrient uptake.

Learn more!

What Kind of Results You Can Expect?

Because of the minimizing of both calories and carbohydrates, you will see a fast weight drop.

Learn more!

How Do You Get Started?

DAYS 9-13: Protein and Veggies

DAYS 14-21: Carb Cycling

DAYS 1-8: Carb Detox and Reset

Learn more!

Click the below link for more detailed 
instructions on the
21-Day Diet Challenge

Get More Details!
